job_description:
We are seeking an experienced Machine Learning Educator to join our AI/ML Education team. In this role, you will design and deliver comprehensive machine learning training programs for engineers, data scientists, and product teams across Apple. 

You will develop curriculum that covers deep learning, neural networks, LLMs (Large Language Models), and responsible AI practices. Your responsibilities include creating educational materials, facilitating workshops, developing hands-on tutorials, and building assessment rubrics to evaluate learning outcomes.

You will work closely with cross-functional teams to ensure training content aligns with Apple's commitment to privacy, fairness, and ethical AI. This role requires developing documentation for internal tools and frameworks, enabling teams to effectively leverage AI/ML capabilities in their work.

You will also contribute to educational enablement initiatives that support Apple's broader AI strategy. The ideal candidate will have a passion for teaching, strong technical expertise in machine learning, and experience in curriculum development.

You will engage with diverse learners including software engineers, researchers, and product managers, adapting your teaching style to meet their needs. This position offers the opportunity to shape how Apple builds AI expertise internally and supports our mission of creating innovative, responsible AI solutions.
job_qualification:
Required:
- Master's degree in Computer Science, Machine Learning, or related field (PhD preferred)
- 5+ years of experience in machine learning, deep learning, or AI research
- Proven experience in teaching, training, or curriculum development
- Strong understanding of neural networks, transformers, LLMs, and generative AI
- Experience with PyTorch, TensorFlow, or similar ML frameworks
- Excellent communication and presentation skills
- Ability to create clear, accessible educational content for diverse audiences
- Understanding of responsible AI practices, fairness, and ethics in ML
- Experience with educational technology and learning platforms

Preferred:
- Experience developing training programs in industry settings
- Published research or educational content in machine learning
- Experience with adult learning principles and instructional design
- Knowledge of Apple's ML frameworks and tools
- Background in explainable AI and model interpretability
- Experience working with cross-functional teams in a technical organization
